meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>sell</kanji>, and this is a transitive verb meaning <vocabulary>to sell something</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You want <vocabulary>to sell something</vocabulary>, but what? What can you sell that will take the least amount of work? <reading>U</reading>ni (う)! They're just hanging out in the ocean, ready for the taking. Go scoop some up, watch out for the pointy bits, and sell them for some quick cash!
